document_data.name: Uldreiyn Starym
document_data.mainbody: '''Uldreiyn Starym''' was a male [[elf]] and a former [[archmage]] of the [[Starym|Starym House]] of [[Cormanthyr]] who attempted to corrupt the raising of the ''[[mythal]]'' in [[261 DR]]. He also slew [[Aulathar Orbryn]] in the rebellion.
